characters.name: Aalto
characters.quote: Well, if it isn't my loyal patron! What do you wish to inquire about today?

characters.name: Baizhi
characters.quote: No, I cannot place my faith in it, but my anticipation stems precisely from this distrust. A claim is always verifiable before it is discredited entirely.

characters.name: Calcharo
characters.quote: They'll make an offer we like. I'll make sure of it.

characters.name: Carlotta
characters.quote: The beauty of art shouldn't be confined by a viewer's knowledge or taste.

characters.name: Changli
characters.quote: Eons of time on this vast land, all encapsulated in a humble game... I am fortunate to have you as my opponent.

characters.name: Chixia
characters.quote: Jinzhou Patroller, Chixia. You can always call on me if you ever find yourself in a pickle!

characters.name: Danjin
characters.quote: Wherever I go, I swear to vanquish evil, whether it's out in the daylight or hiding in the dark.

characters.name: Encore
characters.quote: A long, long time ago... Cosmos told Encore about a fun spot! Come on! Let's go check it out!

characters.name: Jianxin
characters.quote: Release the wants, and the mind quiets. Cleanse the thoughts, and the soul clears.

characters.name: Jinhsi
characters.quote: There's still much to be done. Please rest assured, I am here to guide you through it.

characters.name: Jiyan
characters.quote: I have never regretted to brave the long night.

characters.name: Lingyang
characters.quote: Awooâ€”Lion up! Victory is mine at this year's Greens-plucking Tournament!

characters.name: Mortefi
characters.quote: Fine, since you've done this much for me... Go ahead, tell me the wildest inventions you can think of, and watch me make them happen for you.

characters.name: Rover
characters.quote: Is this the beginning of a new journey? Brimming with novel sounds, and untold stories...

characters.name: Sanhua
characters.quote: Please don't stay too far away from me. I am confident to not let you get harmed in the slightest.

characters.name: Shorekeeper
characters.quote: The Shorekeeper... This name suits me well enough. It aligns with my purpose and drive: they only exist because of you

characters.name: Taoqi
characters.quote: Phew... All set. Time for a little break.

characters.name: Verina
characters.quote: Plants talk in a silent and sincere language. I can translate their talk for you, if you want.

characters.name: Xiangli Yao
characters.quote: As truthseekers, we gauge the universe from within a nutshell. I'd love to hear your insights.

characters.name: Yangyang
characters.quote: I hope I can be the one to embrace all that you are, and share with you all that you carry.

characters.name: Yinlin
characters.quote: Name's Yinlin. As for what I do... Shhh, we don't talk about that in public.

characters.name: Youhu
characters.quote: Here you go, a special edition of my poetry collection, hand-signed by moi! You are welcome!

characters.name: Yuanwu
characters.quote: Assuming I've thought my decisions through and acted with integrity, I am content.

characters.name: Zhezhi
characters.quote: What I wanted to say is, the sunlight on you right now is so beautiful. Can I... paint you?
